tradestatistics v1.0

  • Changelog

A table of group codes and names associated to products

ots_groups.Rd

Provides section names from the Harmonized System.

ots_groups

Format

A data frame with 97 observations on the following 2 variables.

group_code

Group code (e.g. 01)

group_fullname_english

Group name (e.g. Animals; live )

Examples

ots_groups
#>     group_code
#>  1:         01
#>  2:         02
#>  3:         03
#>  4:         04
#>  5:         05
#>  6:         06
#>  7:         07
#>  8:         08
#>  9:         09
#> 10:         10
